songs.title: Intro Da New Crip
songs.lyrics:
(man and woman speaking in Spanish)

Don’t know why they get away
Trying to open the nigga
Even good hearted people
We got a limit nigga
I be cripping for real
This ain’t no gimmick nigga

Go and hang with the women
You little timid nigga
You kinda fendin and sugary type cinnamon
Keep on acting
You gonna have to cause
We gonna jack you we indigent
Any event never about my lonely
I got two lonely that’s how I move homey
The streets come with rules homey

I’ll send my whole team
I’ll bet you I don’t lose homey
And I betcha I’ll catch a body for every
Rules homey
Bloody headlines
You going to make the news homey
Wanna die, wanna live
I guess you gotta choose homey
Cuz what
You better move homey
What‚ you thought you was gonna make a move homey?
The knocc out make blind date
Cause you don’t know what’s coming
Like we collecting on a debt
But you don’t owe us nothing
Over here it’s no bluffing
I’m not a poker playa
Ice pick poke a player
Blunt ass smoke a playa
Neck noose choke a playa
G hey broke the playa
That’s what you banging?
Well I’m gonna make them find you over there
Niggas got it fucked up
Like thinking they can’t get fucked up
They don’t know the drama
That will get if they momma stuck up
Guns fucked up
Blood rush
Yup
That’s a blood bath
Surgical equipment‚ ski masks
Tthat’s a must have
Yup like a ben player
I  be for blood bath
That’s a foolish move
You niggas make us mad
Body parts‚ toe tags
Callous parts, mortuaries
Cold blooded, psychopathic‚ ordinary
